spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall zoning resembles the plan (central hall left, dining lower-left, kitchen/right), but multiple key spaces are omitted/merged. E2/E4: Kitchen–dining–breakfast boundaries and wall lines do not match the 2D plan (plan shows a more defined kitchen with adjacent utility/pantry; render reads as a large open area). E2/E3: Several interior door locations/orientations do not match the plan’s indicated door swings, especially around the hall-to-service-area connections. E2: Window placement/count on the right/east exterior wall does not match the plan’s specific openings (plan indicates a window-seat/bay condition; render substitutes a different window grouping). E4: Room proportions are distorted—kitchen/breakfast area appears oversized relative to dining and hall compared with the dimensioned plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: E1: Missing WC (powder room) shown at top/center of plan. E1: Missing Utility Room (with W/D, WH) and HVAC/service closets shown between hall and kitchen in plan. E1: Missing Pantry as a distinct enclosed/defined element (render shows cabinetry but not the plan’s pantry volume). E2: Adjacency relationships are incorrect because service core (WC/utility/HVAC) that should buffer hall and kitchen is not present, changing circulation and wall topology. Wall thickness is visually consistent in the render, but door embedding/partition continuity diverges from plan due to omitted walls.

furniture_mapping.notes: E2: Kitchen cabinetry/island configuration does not correspond to the plan (plan indicates specific appliance placements incl. REF and pantry wall; render uses a different L-layout and island proportions). E2/E4: Dining table placement is plausible but not mapped to plan features (window/door relationships differ). E4: Some furniture scales (island/table clearances) appear inconsistent with the plan’s tighter service-core constraints.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Isometric presentation is clean and readable with decent lighting and materials. However, E6: Text decals on floors (e.g., room labels) reduce realism/clarity. Orthographic/isometric accuracy is acceptable but not strict-architectural (camera feels slightly perspective). Geometry is mostly clean, but the substituted window/bay compositions weaken fidelity to the source.

detected_errors.description: WC/powder room shown on the 2D plan is missing in the 3D render.
Utility room (with W/D/WH) shown on the 2D plan is missing/merged into other space in the 3D render.
HVAC/service closet area shown on the 2D plan is missing in the 3D render.
Pantry as a defined space/element from the 2D plan is not represented correctly in the 3D render.
Interior wall layout between hall and kitchen differs from the plan (omitted partitions create an overly open connection).
Door positions around the central hall and toward the service/kitchen zone do not match the plan’s locations.
Several door swing/orientation cues implied by the plan are not respected (doors appear flipped or relocated).
Right/east exterior window placement/count differs from the plan, including the plan’s window-seat/bay condition being replaced by different window groupings.
Room proportions are distorted: kitchen/breakfast zone appears significantly larger relative to dining/hall than in the dimensioned 2D plan.
Hall/kitchen area includes simplified or added open spans not present in the 2D plan (hallucinated openness due to missing partitions).
Floor text labels (e.g., 'KITHHC', 'BREAKFAST') are rendering artifacts that reduce architectural clarity.
